CustomField.description: This cross object formula is used to retrieve the checkbox "Is Subcontractor" from the related Service Resource record. This is e.g. used as a filter criteria in get elements on the flow "Work Complete Review" in order to show a data table of all internal Service Resources and their total labour time so that the JC can see a preview on how many Labour Lines will be created after the flow finishes.
CustomField.label: Assigned Resource Is Subcontractor
